Interviews not assigned to requisitions or pools will not appear in the reports and you will not get statistics.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"           \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"   !!! We work with TA entities only. Interviews assigned to positions will not appear in the reports!!! Positions belong to staffing. Do not use them in your hiring process. The same will happen – no statistics in the reports.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
